body.name: Bamboo Shoe Rack - Vertical Shoe Rack for Small Spaces, Tall Narrow Shoe Rack Organizer for Closet Entryway Corner Garage and Bedroom,Skinny Shoe Shelf Free Stackable DIY - Space Saving Storage
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 36 mins
features: - Space-saving solution: Our bamboo shoe rack is perfect for small spaces, featuring a 7-tier vertical design that stands tall and fits in a corner.You can also design layers according to your own space and stack them freely. DIY can be placed under the table in the wardrobe, or used as a storage rack or bookshelf, making your home no longer messy.
- Stylish and slim: This shoe tower rack has a sleek, modern look that complements any decor, while its narrow design makes it easy to tuck away in an entryway or closet.
- Versatile storage: With ample shelves and compartments, this vertical shoe rack for small spaces can hold everything from slippers and sandals to boots and sneakers.
- Easy assembly: The standing shoe rack comes with all necessary hardware and instructions, making it a breeze to put together in just minutes.
- Durable and aesthetically pleasing: Made from sturdy bamboo, this tall skinny shoe rack is a sustainable choice for shoe storage that will last for years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: i got the 12 tier and its around 5’9 (feet), is a little flimsy but it works great just for shoes and was easy to install, fits my shoes and small hangbags perfectly. would definitely buy again! 💕

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A pleasant surprise
reviews.reviewText: I needed a small vertical shoe rack for slippers, and thought I'd give this a try. It's a pretty shelf, useful for lots of things besides shoes. It's also surprisingly sturdy, especially for something is held together without glue or hardware.The assembly instructions are not written the best, but it was easy to figure out. You'll need to be firm and even when pressing the pieces together. Knocking down one star because the dimensions in the description are not accurate (although it actually did turn out to be roomy enough to accommodate a pair of running shoes) and because it wants to lean a little (not enough to make me worry, but I might anchor it to the wall).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Glue is a must!
reviews.reviewText: It was easy enough to assemble though the parts I already assembled kept coming apart as I assembled the additional shelves. I thought the weight of shoes on the shelves would make it sturdier but it did not. Pieces came apart within a few days as I placed or removed shoes from the shelves.After 2 weeks, I took it apart and reassembled it with wood glue. It is now almost perfect. I say almost because I would be happier if it was just a tad bit wider. I have big feet - I wear a size 10 in Women's shoes and I have to place my shoes on the shelves one at a time otherwise if I hold the shoes in one hand and try to place them on the shelf together, they don't fit.Also, I cannot fit low-rise boots on the shelves so I can only store one pair at a time on the top shelf.It is VERY lightweight and not very sturdy so it should be placed somewhere it cannot easily be bumped into. I have it near my front door but it is positioned in way that it cannot be knocked over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, but perfect for my needs
reviews.reviewText: I needed just a bit more room for my shoes and this was perfect. It is small, be sure to check the measurements, but it fits perfectly where I wanted it. I feel like the spaces between the levels is great. It won’t fit tall boots, but it fit my ankle height boots. I would like to be able to remove a layer for tall boots, but that’s not an option. I have size 7 women’s feet, so the depth is not a problem for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars One Shelf is missing a Slot
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this shoe rack to be used for my 5 year old son's shoes (due to reading that only smaller shoes will fit).CON: After compleating building most of the racks I noticed one of the shelves is missing 1 out of 4 of the the slots that the connecting strip is supposed to fit into. I tried to see if there was a way for me to reach out to the seller to resolve this by getting a replacment part without having to take the whole thing apart but I do not see a way.PRO: Good for small items and child sized shoes. Feels flimsy till you put items on the racks then gravity does it's thing. Nice to not have to deal with tools and screws that can strip the wood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cracks, splits on assembly: Bamboo Shoe Rack 17 Tier- Vertical Shoe Rack for Small Spaces
reviews.reviewText: It's a great idea, poorly executed.As I assembled it, pressing the support pieces into the hole - each hole did split. Only one or two was simply "firm" otherwise extremely tight and of course the Bamboo, as it does, it split.If you have a mind to keep it as you put it together and are handy, simply apply some white-glue as you go. But - then, that's it and will remain.I liked the functional, changeable design - sadly, it would not survive a reconfiguration well, unless then glued. I considered hard-bar-soap to possibly ease my assembly then wondered - so proceeded.I got the 17 tier format. I see/saw I would wind up with left over pieces which confuses me - either a platform (need even numbers for tiers since it takes two to make one) - or, the support sticks (two packets leftover with how I configured this.It could otherwise be a 4-5 star recommendation, but sadly, not with how this was and I read the other reviews.I don't have the time to "sand" holes and etc. and expect to receive a product as describe and not damage itself as assembled - unless specified - "expect cracks and splitting" ? as you proceed and left over parts if purchase the uneven format. If it had 18 platform pieces I could have used the left over 8 support sticks - 4 to make that level and 4 to attache it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BETTER THAN EXPECTED!!
reviews.reviewText: When I opened the box, I wasn't sure this would work for a 7 slot shoe rack. But when I started putting it together, I changed my opinion. It is much stronger that I imagined. I ended-up using only 5 of the 7 slots, and it's great. I can always add the other 2 later if I need them. Very clever design, great price! Good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clearly A great solution to organize!
reviews.reviewText: This was exactly what the product description promised. Easy to assemble and extremely versatile to fit my needs. I am trying to organize my closet and can’t afford a professional or modular units, so have created my own schematic. I am very satisfied with the versatility & appearance!

We looked forever for a solution for our tiny hall closet and this works great. Women's size 9 shoes fit fine and you just have to put the men's size 10's in one at a time - both hang out a bit over the front. Anything much bigger might be a problem. Wish I could buy a smaller set to add a few more rows. They fit together really well and were pretty sturdy once in place. Technically you only get two top sections (it has a different style post so there's no hole). I needed 3 stacks so one has a gap in the top but it still functions well and you can't see it anyway.
Product is ok, base pieces are really thin and the edges split really easily. It's ok but I wouldn't but it again.
Item is very flimsy, had to glue it together as it kept coming apart. Would not recommend.
